subject: Mental Health
title: CBT for Eating Disorders
description: A micro-lesson that makes CBT for Eating Disorders usable.

hook.text: The leading treatment for bulimia and binge eating targets the thoughts, not just the food.

buildup.text: CBT-E (enhanced) addresses the distorted beliefs about weight, shape, and self-worth.

discovery.text: It normalizes eating patterns and challenges the rigid food rules driving the disorder.

twist.text: About 50 percent of people with bulimia fully recover with CBT-E alone.

climax.text: CBT-E works across all eating disorder diagnoses â€” not just bulimia.

punchline.text: Fix the thinking and the eating follows.

quiz.question: What is CBT-E designed to treat?
options: Distorted beliefs about weight, shape, and self-worth in eating disorders
